name: Going Nuts
description:
Become a thrill seeking squirrel, flying through dense forests, gathering delicious acorns in GOING NUTS! Smash through obstacles with helmets or dress up as a classic stuntman. Watch out for owls, bad nuts or TNT tied to balloons! How far can YOU fly?

Thank you to our thousands of fans, giving us an average rating of 4.5 out of 5 stars for several years and running!

Features:

- Exciting 3D graphics and just the darned cutest little squirrel!
- Intense game play as you fly through lush trees, burnt forests and ice spires, gaining speed all the way
- Plenty of power-ups, upgrades and outfits to buy in the shop with the nuts you gather or purchase
- Level up and gain rewards by completing goals
- Show off to your friends with leaderboards and achievements

GOING NUTS is brought to you by the fine folks at good luck, have fun, who go nuts on a regular basis.

Be sure to check out some of our other mobile games like RUSH 'HOWER, BOUNCE THE BUNNY, CLICK! THE GAME, MAGIC CORAL, RECYCLING MOO, and the oddball contemplative DON:T LET IT END.

Follow us!
on Twitter: @glhfbiz
on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/goodluckhavefun.biz
on the web: http://www.glhf.biz

Thanks for playing!
